problem_text_cn: 如图,身高1.6米的学生小李想测量学校的旗杆的高度,当他站在C处时,他头顶端的影子正好与旗杆顶端的影子重合,并测得AC=2米,BC=8米,则旗杆的高度是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the student Xiao Li whose height is N_0 wants to measure the height of the school's flagpole. When he stands at C, the shadow of the top of his head coincides with the shadow of the top of the flagpole, and AC = N_1, BC = N_2, then the height of the flagpole is ()
raw_answer:
解:设旗杆高度为h,
由题意得\frac{1.6}{h}=\frac{2}{2+8},h=8米．
故选:C．
